ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Master Yael and Nortlav the Scale Keeper - how do y ou do 'em?
ygData.msgSnippet: Well after some research and asking some friends I think he only drops the Red scale.  Which is silly because its one of the easier ones to get seeing that you
ygData.messageBody:
Well after some research and asking some friends I think he only drops the
Red scale. Which is silly because its one of the easier ones to get seeing
that you can get it from Naggy, Ragefire and Scale Keeper (both fairly easy)
and you can only get the green one from the kunark dragon and some dragon in
VP now. I really hope you are right about the green one from the scale
keeper, that is such a huge bottle neck for the warrior epic much like the
white scale for the bards.

Mu

-----Original Message-----
From: Daniel Sniderman [mailto:fuzzbone@...]
Sent: Tuesday, July 31, 2001 7:50 PM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Master Yael and Nortlav the Scale Keeper - how do
y ou do 'em?


According to the backstage board - Nortlav has never dropped anything but a
Red. Occasionally drops two of them. No one has ever confirmed a drop of a
green (at least on that board). Quamper (you didn't sign) have you seen a
green drop?

Slyde

-----Original Message-----
From: quamper [mailto:mail@...]
Sent: Tuesday, July 31, 2001 12:24 PM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Master Yael and Nortlav the Scale Keeper - how do
y ou do 'em?


I can confirm, he can drop multiple red scales and green scales (though I
haven't seen green in multiple).


---------- Original Message ----------------------------------
From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
Reply-To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Date: Tue, 31 Jul 2001 10:06:40 -0500

Thanks for the tips (other posters).

I think he drops red and sometimes green scales.

Syl

-----Original Message-----
From: Nygaardr, FC3 [mailto:nygaardr@...]
Sent: Monday, July 30, 2001 10:07 PM
To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Master Yael and Nortlav the Scale Keeper - how do
y ou do 'em?


What scale does he drop? Just the red one?

Mu
